item.description:
In reply to <a href="/which-flux-implementation-should-i-use-with-react/#comment-3005">Jonas Windey</a>.
I probably could have put it a little clearer, but if you keep reading about two more sentences I say that Redux is in fact the implementation you should use - it just might not actually be <em>Flux</em>.
